data.title: Al Ittihad relaunches on 45th anniversary - video
data.text:
Al Ittihad newspaper marked its 45th anniversary on Monday with the unveiling of a new, high-tech newsroom.The newspaper will also have a new, red masthead that has been based on the original one from when it was first published in 1969.

Those attending the ceremony at the Abu Dhabi Media offices included Sheikh Mohammed bin Hamdan Al Nahyan, Vice President of Al Jazira Club, Mohammed Al Mahmoud, Chief Executive Officer of Abu Dhabi Media and Rashid Al Oraimi, the former Editor-in-Chief of Al Ittihad.
